title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Understand the principles of propulsion systems and their applications in aerospace.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion processes in rocket engines and their efficiency.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket engine nozzle for specific performance criteria.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge on fundamental aerodynamic principles.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Conduct computational fluid dynamics (CFD) analysis for various flow regimes.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study thermal protection systems and heat transfer phenomena in re-entry vehicles.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design load-bearing structures for spacecraft, considering material properties and stress.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform calculations for orbital mechanics, including trajectory and maneuvers.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive examination on systems engineering principles and methodologies.
